After I kick her she still buy food at my cafe, but I refuse to see here again, after that she always come with other dude and changing always 6 month and she look depressed, her friends come to me very angry and blame me for her health drops, and what I say to her?, you can blame me, but your money at my hand, I can took all your business and your wealth and you will become poor, now who's bigger scumbag here? Me? Or her? Your choice. He back down and wanted to call police but police on my side because he still have debt at me. After several months later she apologize to me and wanted me to marry her, I refuse it, give her money to hospital to do some operations and sent her to rehabilitation house.

After what i through at my life, yeah maybe some of people don't have life like NTR doujin but me I've been through it so much 12 times in fact and now I don't have any empathy or emotions anymore to girl even if she attractive, I still do kind of good thing like helping other but for love? I don't because 12 times been betrayed is enough for me, now I'm focused on my food business, and.... It's pretty well people coming every day and me always make profit, even I do some recycling food for more benefits at other sector like farming, now what happen? My last ex come to my food Cafe always ordering food for herself but also try to make attention to me, i know it but I don't like it, she never apologize to me and I've always become a victim to her, her BF and her friends and me are the one who always apologize, now she wanted to took my business and that's when I snapped, I gave her back her money, give her platinum ring and money that worth of total $705 or Rp 10 million and kick her

This NTR story is probably one of the most depressing and cruel one on this site, it's not just about "Dumb and blind/ignorant fuck MC" that never changed or realized what happened to his girlfriend.

The MC actually did something different and had a character development throughout the entire series... A shame that doesn't = dick size development because that's the only thing he is lacking.

And after all that, you can see that he actually got heavily traumatized and on Page  29 you can see the aftermath that he never actually recovered from it. What a heartbreaking tragedy story, a fucking shame people are just fighting over NTR vs "Vanillafag". 


And to you people who say "it's porn don't pay too much attention to the plot" then do yourself a favour and go jack off to those fake ass porn plots over at pornhub If you can't even realize that Hentai isn't just about horny drawing
